data.title: Spicy flavor - saveur pimentée
data.solution:
import sys

shoudTaste = "None" # if no available meet the 'spicier condition'

n = int(input())
tastedPeppers = [ input().split(",") for i in range(n) ] + [[shoudTaste, -1]]

p = int(input())
availPeppers = [ input().split(",") for i in range(p) ]

maxTastedPepper = int(max(tastedPeppers, key = lambda x:int(x[1]))[1])
tastedPeppers.sort(key = lambda x: int(x[1]))
availPeppers.sort(key = lambda x: int(x[1]))

# for DEBUG purpose :
print(*tastedPeppers, file=sys.stderr, flush=True)
print(*availPeppers, file=sys.stderr, flush=True)
print(maxTastedPepper, file=sys.stderr, flush=True)

for pepper in availPeppers:
    if(int(pepper[1]) > maxTastedPepper):
        shoudTaste = pepper[0]
        break
print(shoudTaste)
data.statement:
Tom wants to discover progressively new spicy flavors.
=> Indicate him, among the [[p]] sauces and peppers available on the market, the least-spicy flavor, spicier than everything he has already tried, he should taste soon ...

*** Original French version ***

Tom souhaite découvrir progressivement de nouvelles saveurs pimentées.
=> Trouver, parmi les [[p]] sauces et piments disponibles au marché, la moins épicée tout en étant plus épicée que toutes celles déjà goûtées jusqu'à présent.

data.stubGenerator:
read n:int
loop n read tastedPepperNameAndSpiciness:string(50)
read p:int
loop p read availablePepperNameAndSpiciness:string(50)
write next Pepper or sauce Name Tom should taste
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1 :>> integer [[n]], the count of <<peppers and sauces>> Tom already tasted
<<next [[n]] lines :>> [[already tasted pepper or sauce name]] with [[spiciness]] (in SHU = Scoville Heat Units), comma separated
<<Next line :>> integer [[p]], the count of <<peppers and sauces available>> on the market
<<next [[p]] lines :>> [[available pepper or sauce name]] with [[spiciness]] (in SHU), comma separated
data.outputDescription:
Indicate to Tom the least-spicy flavor - that is spicier than everything he has already tasted - he should try.
If none of them meet the criteria, print {{None}}.

*** Original French version ***

Indique à Tom le premier piment davantage épicé que ceux déjà goûtés disponible qu'il devrait essayer.
Si aucun d'eux ne convient, retourne {{None}}.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Tom wants to discover progressively new spicy flavors.
=> Indicate him, among the p sauces and peppers available on the market, the least-spicy flavor, spicier than everything he has already tried, he should taste soon ...

*** Original French version ***

Tom souhaite découvrir progressivement de nouvelles saveurs pimentées.
=> Trouver, parmi les p sauces et piments disponibles au marché, la moins épicée tout en étant plus épicée que toutes celles déjà goûtées jusqu'à présent.
Input
Line 1 : integer n, the count of peppers and sauces Tom already tasted
next n lines : already tasted pepper or sauce name with spiciness (in SHU = Scoville Heat Units), comma separated
Next line : integer p, the count of peppers and sauces available on the market
next p lines : available pepper or sauce name with spiciness (in SHU), comma separated
Output
Indicate to Tom the least-spicy flavor - that is spicier than everything he has already tasted - he should try.
If none of them meet the criteria, print None.

*** Original French version ***

Indique à Tom le premier piment davantage épicé que ceux déjà goûtés disponible qu'il devrait essayer.
Si aucun d'eux ne convient, retourne None.
Constraints
0 <= n <= 50
0 <= p <= 50
spiciness >= 0
Example
Input
1
Banana pepper,100
5
Shishito pepper,150
Pepperoncini pepper,300
El-Paso pepper,600
Manzano pepper,12000
Tabiche pepper,85000
Output
Shishito pepper
